name: next-jwt-auth
description: Easily integrate your custom JWT auth service in NextJS app

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run prepare && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run prepare && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run prepare && npm publish

author: Shakil Ahmed (shakilbuet63@gmail.com)
